fields_of_interest: Trade, Culture, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Single market, Transport
eu_initiatives: Follow-up as stakeholder and lobbyist, the revision of the European Directive (2000/59/EC) regarding port reception facilities for ship-generated and cargo wastes.
organisation_name: Eco-Oil – Treatment of Contaminated Water, SA (Eco-Oil)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Eco-Oil – Treatment of Contaminated Water, SA, is the Portuguese company with the largest capacity for treating water contaminated with hydrocarbons. 
We treat oily waste from marine or terrestrial origin, and our treatment process values the hydrocarbons to produce fuel oil. 
The treatment unit, strategically located in the port of Setubal, incorporates control technology and centralized monitoring system, ensuring high standards of treatment efficiency as well as environmental safety.
